briefTitle: Studying Blood and DNA Samples From Patients With Breast Cancer Treated With Chemotherapy With or Without Trastuzumab
officialTitle: Adjuvant Chemotherapy Combined With Trastuzumab in the Randomized Phase III Trial N9831 Actively Immunizes Patients Against Tumor Antigens
eligibilityCriteria:
• Patients with HER-2-overexpressing node-positive or high-risk node-negative breast cancer enrolled on NCCTG-N9831

\* Pre- and post-treatment serum and DNA samples of patients treated with doxorubicin and cyclophosphamide followed by paclitaxel with or without trastuzumab (Herceptin®)
